param.span: 如果這是資源檔，則必須是 。

span.span: Must be if this is a resource file.

summary.span: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 方法之存取權。

span.span: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the method.

returns.span: 載入的模組。

span.span: The loaded module.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是用於存取 managed 類別，並不會呼叫從 managed 程式碼。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 方法與通用物件檔案格式 （coff） 為基礎的影像，其中包含發出的模組或資源檔載入這個組件的內部模組。The method loads the module, internal to this assembly, with a Common Object File Format (COFF)-based image containing an emitted module, or a resource file. 表示模組符號的未經處理位元組也載入。The raw bytes representing the symbols for the module are also loaded.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Location As String
public: property System::String ^ Location { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 屬性之存取權。

span.span: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the property.

value.span: 包含資訊清單之載入檔的位置。

span.span: The location of the loaded file that contains the manifest.

value.span: 如果載入檔已經過陰影複製，則該位置就是陰影複製後的檔案位置。

span.span: If the loaded file was shadow-copied, the location is that of the file after being shadow-copied.

value.span: 如果組件是從位元組陣列載入 (例如，使用 方法多載時)，則傳回值就是空字串 ("")。

span.span: If the assembly is loaded from a byte array, such as when using the method overload, the value returned is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是用於存取 managed 類別，並不會呼叫從 managed 程式碼。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 屬性取得的路徑或通用命名慣例 (UNC) 包含資訊清單之載入檔的位置。The property gets the path or Universal Naming Convention (UNC) location of the loaded file that contains the manifest.

summary.span: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 事件之存取權。

span.span: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是用於存取 managed 類別，並不會呼叫從 managed 程式碼。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. Common language runtime 類別載入器無法解析的內部模組經由一般方法的組件的參考時，就會發生事件。The event occurs when the common language runtime class loader cannot resolve a reference to an internal module of an assembly through normal means.

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫端。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成員不能由部分信任或不透明的程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string ToString() cil managed

summary.span: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 方法之存取權。

span.span: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the method.

returns.span: 組件的完整名稱或類別名稱 (如果無法判斷組件的完整名稱)。

span.span: The full name of the assembly, or the class name if the full name of the assembly cannot be determined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是用於存取 managed 類別，並不會呼叫從 managed 程式碼。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 方法會傳回組件，也稱為顯示名稱的完整名稱。The method returns the full name of the assembly, also known as the display name.
